channel.title: swimming pool on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in swimming pool on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Aarush @ Swimming pool
item.description: During April and May Aarush and Pamela went to Swimming pool almost daily for a few weeks. Every day around 10:30 or so he would make his best effort to get his swimming gear and would ask us to put it for him. But after few weeks we had to stop as we realized his cough was not getting cured and he got lots of sun tan. And now after the operation he is out of scope for any water sports for next one year.
